column2: "Nna Samuel faa ngo toaba no
column3: na ohuei guu Saul ne tsir do
column4: na ɔfeew n'ano
column6: Ana nnyɛ EWURADZE na ɔdze ngo egu wo do ahyɛ wo hen wɔ ne man Israel do bi a? Na ibedzi EWURADZE no nkorɔfo do hen
column7: na agye hɔn efi hɔn atamfo nyina nsamu. Iyi na ɔbɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama wo dɛ EWURADZE ahyɛ wo panyin wɔ n'egyapadze do."

column2: "Sɛ isi mu fi me nkyɛn ndɛ rokɔ a
column3: ɔno ibohu mberantsɛ beenu wɔ Rakel ne nda no nkyɛn
column4: wɔ Benjamin he do wɔ Zelza; na wɔbɛse wo dɛ
column5: Nsoaso no a ekɔr dɛ erokɔhwehwɛ no woehu hɔn; na
column7: w'egya egyaa nsoasopɔnkɔ no ho dwen
column9: Me ba yi mebɛyɛ no dɛn?"

column2: "Nkyii sɛ ifi hɔ kɔ kan
column3: na ikodu Tabor esudur no ho a
column4: enye mbarimba baasa behyia hɔ a wɔrofow akɔ Nyankopɔn hɔ wɔ Bɛtɛl
column6: na ɔbaako so so boodoo ntɔwmu ebiasa
column7: na ɔbaako so so wenyin bɔdambɔ kɛse:"

column2: "na wobekyia wo
column3: na wɔdze boodoo ntɔwmu ebien ama wo; na agye no wɔ hɔn nsamu."

column2: "Ɔno n'ekyir no ibodu Gibea-elohim
column3: mbrɛ Filistiafo bansifo no wɔ no: na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ isi kurow no mu hɔ a
column4: ibehyia nkɔnhyɛfo kuw a wofi bea sorɔnsorɔm no do risian a wɔdze bɛntasanku na mpintsin
column6: na nsanku dzi hɔn enyim; na wɔrehyɛ nkɔm:"

column2: "na EWURADZE no sunsum bɛba wo do dzendzenndzen
column3: na enye hɔn bɛhyɛ nkɔm
column4: na adan ayɛ nyimpa fofor."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔba dɛ
column3: nsɛnkyerɛdze yi ba mu ma wo a
column4: yɛ dɛ mbrɛ obesi w'enyim no ara; na Nyankopɔn dzi w'ekyir."

column2: "Na dzi m'enyim kan sian kɔ Gilgal; na
column3: hwɛ
column4: mebɛba wo nkyɛn abɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column5: na okum asomdwee afɔr; nda esuon na tsintsim araa kɛpem aber a mebɛba wo nkyɛn

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dɛm
column3: dɛ aber a ɔdaan noho fii Samuel nkyɛn rokɔ no
column4: Nyankopɔn maa no akoma fofor: na nsɛnkyerɛdze no nyinara baa mu da no ara."

column2: "Na wɔbaa Gibea no
column3: hwɛ
column4: nkɔnhyɛfo kuw no nye no hyiae; na Nyankopɔn no sunsum baa no do dzendzenndzen
column5: na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ hɔn mu."

column2: "Na hɔn a wonyim no dada no hun dɛ
column3: ɔnye nkɔnhyɛfo no rehyɛ nkɔm no
column4: nna nkorɔfo no bisabisaa hɔnho nkorkor dɛ
column5: Ebɛnadze na aba Kish ne ba no do yi? Ana Saul so dɔm nkɔnhyɛfo no a?"

column2: "Na obi a ofi hɔ ara buae na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Na woyinom so woana nye hɔn egya? Dɛm ntsi ɔbɛyɛɛ kasabɛbu dɛ
column4: Ana Saul so dɔm nkɔnhyɛfo no a?"

column2: "Na owiee nkɔm hyɛ no
column3: ɔbaa bea sorɔnsorɔm no do."

column2: "Na Saul n'egya no nua bisaa ɔno na n'akowaa no
column3: dɛ
column4: Henfa na hom kɔree? Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Yɛkɔhwehwɛɛ nsoasopɔnkɔ no: na yehun dɛ wonnyi beebiara no na yɛkɔr Samuel hɔ."

column2: "Na Saul n'egya no nua no see dɛ
column3: Meserɛ wo
column4: ka dza Samuel kaa kyerɛɛ hom no kyerɛ me."

column2: "Na Saul see n'egya no nua no dɛ
column3: Ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɛn kotoo dɛ woehu nsoasopɔnkɔ no. Na ahendzi no ho asɛm no a Samuel kae no dze
column4: ɔannka annkyerɛ no."

column2: "Na Samuel hyiaa ɔman no ma wɔbaa EWURADZE nkyɛn wɔ Mizpa;"
"na ɔsee Israelmba no dɛ
column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no ɔse nye yi
column5: emi na medze Israel fii Egypt bae
column6: na megyee hom wɔ Egyptfo nsamu:"

column2: "na ndɛ da yi hom apow hom Nyankopɔn a ɔnoara na ogyaa hom wɔ hom amandzehu na hom ahohiahia nyinara mu; na hom ase no dɛ
column3: Oho
column4: ɔhen ara
column5: na hyɛ no wɔ hɛn do. Dɛm ntsi afei hom mfa homho mbɛkyerɛ wɔ EWURADZE enyim dɛ mbrɛ hom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw na hom mpempem tsetsee."

column2: "Nna Samuel maa Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw bɛsenee
column3: na wɔtwee tonto yii Benjamin ebusuakuw no."

column2: "Na ɔmaa Benjamin ebusuakuw no bɛnee dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
column3: na wɔtwee tonto yii Matrifo ebusua no: na woyii Kish ne ba Saul; na wɔhwehwɛɛ no no woennhu no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wobisaa EWURADZE bio dɛ
column3: Ana nyimpa no baa ha anaa? Na EWURADZE buaa dɛ
column4: Hwɛ
column5: ɔdze noho ekosuma ndzɛmba no mu."

column2: "Na wotuu mbirika kɛfaa no wɔ hɔ bae; na aber a obegyinaa ɔman no mu no
column3: nna ɔbɔ ɔman no nyinara do ofi n'abatsir do kɔ sor."

column2: "Na Samuel see ɔman no nyinara dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ nyia EWURADZE asan mu eyi no no
column4: ana obi nye no sɛ wɔ ɔman no nyinara mu? Na ɔman no nyinara bɔɔ se see dɛ

column2: "Nna Samuel kaa ahendzi no no suban kyerɛɛ ɔman no
column3: na ɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ nwoma mu
column4: na ɔdze too EWURADZE enyim. Na Samuel gyaa ɔman no nyinara kwan ma wɔkɔree
column5: na nyimpa biara kɔr ne fie."

column2: "Na Saul so kɔr ne fie wɔ Gibea; na dɔm no a Nyankopɔn aka hɔn akoma no nye no kɔree."
"Na akwasampafo bi dze wɔsee dɛ
column3: Dɛm nyimpa yi bɛyɛ dɛn agye hɛn nkwa? Na wobuu no enyimtsia
column4: na wɔammfa akyɛdze ammbrɛ no. Naaso Saul annkasa."
